column4: Hey, i'm having a little trouble with broadcom wireless drivers for HP pavillion tx 1000, using ubuntu 9.10 - i've tried using b43-fwcutter and ndiswrapper, ndiswrapper saying the wireless card is not present.

Hey, i'm having a little trouble with broadcom wireless drivers for HP pavillion tx 1000, using ubuntu 9.10 - i've tried using b43-fwcutter and ndiswrapper, ndiswrapper saying the wireless card is not present./
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
